<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#URG-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Additionally, as noted in other risk factors, there are ongoing withdrawals of federal lands for the purposes of mineral location and development. While such proposals are not yet final and, as yet, do not directly affect the area of Wyoming in which we currently have land holdings, they could have an adverse effect on our financial performance if they are broadened in scope to directly affect the areas in which we have properties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Acquisitions and integration may disrupt our business.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	From time to time, we examine opportunities to acquire additional mining assets and businesses. Any acquisition that we may choose to complete may be of significant size, may change the scale of our business and operations, and/or may expose us to new geographic, political, operating, financial and geological risks. Any acquisitions would be accompanied by risks. For example, there may be a significant change in commodity prices after we have committed to complete the transaction and established the purchase price or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	share
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	exchange ratio; a material ore body may prove to be below expectations; we may have difficulty integrating and assimilating the operations and personnel of any acquired compan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	y
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, realizing anticipated synergies and maximizing the financial and strategic position of the combined enterprise, and maintaining uniform standards, policies and controls across the organization; the integration of the acquired business or assets may disrupt our ongoing business and relationships with employees, customers, suppliers and contractors; and the acquired business or assets may have unknown liabilities which may be significant. There can be no assurance that we would be successful in overcoming these risks or any other problems encountered in connection with such acquisitions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	We do not have an established earnings record, and we have never paid dividends.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We do not have an established earnings record, having only commenced operations in the second half of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. We have not paid dividends on our Common Shares since incorporation and do not anticipate doing so in the foreseeable future. Payments of any dividends will be at the discretion of our Board after taking into account many factors, including our financial condition and current and anticipated cash needs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	We depend on the services of our management, key personnel, contractors and service providers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Shareholders will be relying on the good faith, experience and judgment of our management and advisors in supervising and providing for the effective management of the business and our operations and in selecting and developing new investment and expansion opportunities. We may need to recruit additional qualified employees, contractors and service providers to supplement existing management and personnel, the availability of which cannot be assured, particularly in the current labor markets in which we recruit our employees and the somewhat remote locations for which employees are needed. As well, the skilled professionals with expertise in engineering and process aspects of in situ recovery, radiation safety and other facets of our business are currently in high demand, as there are relatively few such professionals with both expertise and experience. We will need to hire additional employees as we develop the Shirley Basin Project. We will continue to be dependent on a relatively small number of key persons, including key contractors, the loss of any one or several of whom could have an adverse effect on our business and operations. We do not hold key man insurance in respect of any of our executive officers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Our insurance coverage could be insufficient.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We currently carry insurance coverage for general liability, directors&#x2019; and officers&#x2019; liability and other matters.&nbsp;&nbsp;We intend to carry insurance to protect against certain risks in such amounts as we consider adequate. Certain insurances may be cost prohibitive to maintain, and even if we carried all such insurances, the nature of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	33
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage34"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#URG-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	risks we face in our exploration and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	uranium
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	production operations is such that liabilities could exceed policy limits in any insurance policy or could be excluded from coverage under an insurance policy. The potential costs that could be associated with any liabilities not covered by insurance or in excess of insurance coverage or compliance with applicable laws and regulations may cause substantial delays and require significant capital outlays, adversely affecting our business and financial position.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Additionally, we utilize a bonding surety program for our regulatory, reclamation and restoration obligations at Lost Creek Project and the Pathfinder Mines sites.&nbsp;&nbsp;Availability of and terms for such surety arrangements may change in the future, resulting in adverse effects to our financial condition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	We are dependent on information technology systems, which are subject to certain risks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We depend upon information technology systems in a variety of ways throughout our operations.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any significant breakdown of those systems, whether through virus, cyber-attack, security breach, theft, or other destruction, invasion or interruption, or unauthorized access to our systems, could negatively impact our business and operations. To the extent that such invasion, cyber-attack or similar security breach results in disruption to our operations, loss or disclosure of, or damage to, our data and particularly our confidential or proprietary information, our reputation, business, results of operations and financial condition could be materially adversely affected.&nbsp;&nbsp;Our systems, internal controls and insurance for protecting against such cyber security risks may be insufficient.&nbsp;&nbsp;Although to date we have experienced no such attack resulting in material losses, we may suffer such losses at any time in the future.&nbsp;&nbsp;We may be required to expend significant additional resources to continue to modify and enhance our protective measures or to investigate, restore or remediate any information technology security vulnerabilities.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	U.S. Federal Income Tax Consequences to U.S. Shareholders under the Passive Foreign Investment Company Rules
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Investors in the Common Shares of Ur-Energy that are U.S. taxpayers (referred to as a U.S. shareholder) should be aware that we may be&nbsp;a &#x201C;passive foreign investment company&#x201D; (a &#x201C;PFIC&#x201D;) for the period ended December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and may be a PFIC in subsequent years. If we are a PFIC for any year during a U.S. shareholder&#x2019;s holding period, then such U.S. shareholders generally will be subject to a special, highly adverse tax regime with respect to so-called &#x201C;excess distributions&#x201D; received on our Common Shares. &nbsp;Gain realized upon a disposition of our Common Shares (including upon certain dispositions that would otherwise be tax-free) also will be treated as an excess distribution. Excess distributions are punitively taxed and are subject to additional interest charges.&nbsp; Additional special adverse rules also apply to U.S. shareholders who own Common Shares of Ur-Energy if we are a PFIC and have a non-U.S. subsidiary that is also a PFIC (a &#x201C;lower-tier PFIC&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	A U.S. shareholder may make a timely "qualified electing fund" election (&#x201C;QEF election&#x201D;) or a "mark-to-market" election with respect to our Common Shares to mitigate the adverse tax rules that apply to PFICs, but these elections may accelerate the recognition of taxable income and may result in the recognition of ordinary income. To be timely, a QEF election generally must be made for the first year in the U.S. shareholder&#x2019;s holding period in which Ur-Energy is a PFIC.&nbsp;&nbsp;A U.S. shareholder may make a QEF election only if the U.S. shareholder receives certain information (known as a &#x201C;PFIC annual information statement&#x201D;) from us annually. A U.S. shareholder may make a QEF election with respect to a lower-tier PFIC only if it receives a PFIC annual information statement with respect to the lower tier PFIC. &nbsp;The mark-to-market election is available only if our Common Shares are considered regularly traded on a qualifying exchange, which we cannot assure will be the case for years in which it may be a PFIC.&nbsp; The mark-to-market election is not available for a lower-tier PFIC.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We will use commercially reasonable efforts to make available to U.S. Holders, upon their written request:&nbsp; (a) timely and accurate information as to our status as a PFIC and the PFIC status of any subsidiary in which Ur-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	34
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Energy owns more than 50% of such subsidiary&#x2019;s total aggregate voting power, and (b) for each year in which Ur-Energy determines that it is a PFIC, upon written request, a PFIC annual information statement with respect to Ur-Energy and with respect to each such subsidiary that we determine is a PFIC.
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Special adverse rules that impact certain estate planning goals could apply to our Common Shares if we are a PFIC. Each U.S. shareholder should consult its own tax advisor regarding the U.S. federal, state and local consequences of the PFIC rules, and regarding the QEF and mark-to-market elections.
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	36
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>

</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage37"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#URG-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Holders
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The authorized capital of Ur-Energy consists of an unlimited number of Common Shares and an unlimited number of Class A Preference Shares.&nbsp;&nbsp;As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	February 25
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	143,323,769
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Common
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Shares are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	issued and outstanding and no preferred shares are issued and outstanding.&nbsp;&nbsp;We estimate that we have approximately 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	beneficial holders of our Common Shares. The holders of the Common Shares are entitled to one vote per share
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	at all meetings of our shareholders. The holders of Common Shares are also entitled to dividends, if and when declared by our Board and the distribution of the residual assets of the company in the event of a liquidation, dissolution or winding up.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our Class A Preference Shares are issuable by the directors in one or more series and the directors have the right and obligation to fix the number of shares in, and determine the designation, rights, privileges, restrictions and conditions attaching to the shares of each series. The rights of the holders of Common Shares will be subject to, and may be adversely affected by, the rights of the holders of any Class A Preference Shares that may be issued in the future. The Class A Preference Shares, may, at the discretion of the Board, be entitled to a preference over the Common Shares and any other shares ranking junior to the Class A Preference Shares with respect to the payment of dividends and distribution of assets in the event of liquidation, dissolution or winding up.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Shareholder Rights Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Ur-Energy maintains a shareholder rights plan (the &#x201C;Rights Plan&#x201D;) designed to encourage the fair and equal treatment of shareholders in connection with any take-over bid for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ompany's outstanding securities.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Rights Plan is intended to provide the Board with adequate time to assess a take-over bid, to consider alternatives to a take-over bid as a means of maximizing shareholder value, to allow competing bids to emerge, and to provide our shareholders with adequate time to properly assess a take-over bid without undue pressure. The Rights Plan was reconfirmed by shareholders at Ur-Energy&#x2019;s annual and special meeting of shareholders
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	on May
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	28
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, 2015.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Dividends
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	To date, we have not paid any dividends on our outstanding Common Shares and have no current intention to declare dividends on the Common Shares in the foreseeable future. Any decision to pay dividends on our Common Shares in the future will be dependent upon our financial requirements to finance future growth, the general financial condition of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ompany and other factors which our Board may consider appropriate in the circumstances.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Recent Sales of Unregistered Securities
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	On December 19, 2013, we closed a private placement through which we issued 4,709,089 share units which comprised one Common Share and one-half warrant for the purchase of Common Shares (for a total of 7,063,634 shares).&nbsp; The issuance of these securities was exempt from the registration requirements of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the &#x201C;Securities Act&#x201D;) by virtue of Section&nbsp;4(a)(2)&nbsp;and Regulation D thereof, as a transaction by an issuer not involving a public offering.&nbsp; To the extent that purchasers were outside the United States, reliance was placed on Regulation S.&nbsp;Proceeds from this private placement were used for development and construction of our Lost Creek project and general corporate purposes.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	On April 4, 2013, we issued 1,000,000 Common Shares, through a private placement, in consideration of a purchase agreement by which we repurchased a royalty interest at the Lost Creek Project. The issuance of these securities was exempt from the registration requirements of the Securities Act by virtue of Section&nbsp;4(a)(2)&nbsp;and Regulation D thereof, as a transaction by an issuer not involving a public offering.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	During the fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ended December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, we did not have any sales of securities in transactions that were not registered under the Securities Act.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Item 6.&nbsp;&nbsp;SELECTED FINANCIAL DATA
</FONT>
<A NAME="URG-20151231X10K_HTM_ITEM6SELECTEDFINANCIALDATA_17355">
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The selected financial data set forth below are derived from our audited consolidated financial statements for the years ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2013, 2012
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, and should be read in conjunction with those financial statements and the notes thereto. The consolidated financial statements have been prepared in accordance with United States generally accepted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	accounting principles (&#x201C;US GAAP&#x201D;).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Reference should also be made to &#x201C;Item 7. Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations.&#x201D;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:12.02%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:12.02%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

<EFX_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION>
<A NAME="FIS_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Item 7.&nbsp;&nbsp;MANAGEMENT&#x2019;S DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS OF FINANCIAL CONDITION AND RESULTS OF OPERATION
</FONT>
<A NAME="URG-20151231X10K_HTM_ITEM7MANAGEMENTSDISCUSSIONANDANALYSISOFF">
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Business Overview
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The following discussion is designed to provide information that we believe necessary for an understanding of our financial condition, changes in financial condition and results of our operations. The following discussion and analysis should be read in conjunction with the accompanying audited consolidated financial statements and related notes. The financial statements have been prepared in accordance with US GAAP.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2015 Developments
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:CAMBRIA;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Lost Creek Property &#x2013; Great Divide Basin, Wyoming
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Following receipt of the final regulatory authorization in October 2012, we commenced construction at Lost Creek. Construction included the plant facility and office building, installation of all process equipment, installation of two access roads, additional power lines and drop lines, deep disposal wells, construction of two holding ponds, warehouse building, and drill shed building. In August 2013, the Company was given operational approval by the NRC and commenced production operation activities.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Production operations in MU1 within the HJ Horizon began on August 2, 2013 and, through September 30, 2015, 1,358,407 pounds of uranium have been produced from this mine unit. For the Lost Creek PEA, all resources produced through September 30, 2015 were subtracted from total Measured Resources from the HJ Horizon in MU1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in order to accurately reflect remaining resources.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	All
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the wells to support the originally-planned 13 header houses (&#x201C;HHs&#x201D;) have been completed. Surface installations for HHs 1-1 through 1-12 have been installed and HHs 1-1 through 1-1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	were operational as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;Construction of header house 13 is underway.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	All monitor ring wells have been installed and pump-tested in MU2. As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, 2015, 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	79
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	pattern wells have been piloted within HHs 2-1, 2-2 and 2-3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(at October 15, 2015, the effective date of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Lost Creek
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	PEA, 138 pattern wells were piloted)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. Additionally, two applications for amendments to the license and permits have been submitted; as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	described in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Lost Creek PEA, the two applications
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	primarily
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	seek to authorize production in the KM Horizon within the Lost Creek Project and to authorize production in the HJ and KM Horizons within the EMT in the LC East Project.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	During 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	783,54
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	pounds of U
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	O
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	were captured within the Lost Creek plant; 727,24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	pounds U
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	O
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8 &nbsp;
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	were packaged in drums; and 717,125 pounds U
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	O
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8 &nbsp;
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of drummed inventory were shipped from the Lost Creek processing plant to the converter. At December 31, inventory at the conversion facility was approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	63,776
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	pounds U
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	O
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	From production, Lost Creek sold 725,000 pounds U
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	O
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8 &nbsp;
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	during 2015 at an average price of US$41.33 per pound. Total sales for 2015, including purchased U
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	O
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, was 925,000 pounds at an average price of US$45.20 per pound. Contract sales were as expected (630,000 pounds at an average price of US$49.42 per pound); however, spot sales were lower than expected (295,000 pounds at an average price of US$36.18) due to the continuing low spot price environment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	After more than two years of operations, the 2015 average plant head grade remained at 97 ppm despite having somewhat lower head grades
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the fourth quarter. Head grade during December was 87 ppm, which was above the quarter&#x2019;s average grade of 85 ppm. The lower head grade during this period of operation, as well as varying month-to-month grades, is a typical result as the mine matures and older operating patterns remain in the flow regime while newer patterns are brought online. This maturation of mine is also demonstrated through the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	41
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage42"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#URG-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	increasing average flowrates
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	as additional HHs are brought on line,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	with a 454 gpm (23.5%) increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	during the fourth quarter as compared to the third quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Lost Creek Regulatory and Legal Proceedings
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	After receiving notice of final operational clearance from the NRC, we commenced production activities at Lost Creek in August
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;Subsequent to those final approvals, we have made necessary additional filings for approvals of ongoing operations at Lost Creek
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	e.g.,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	wellfield development; authorizations related to the new deep disposal well; permits and authority for new Class V wells)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;In September 2014, we filed applications for amendment of all Lost Creek permits and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	licenses to include recovery from the KM horizon and LC East operations.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In 2015, the BLM issued a notice of intent to complete
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	an environmental impact statement for the application. The NRC will participate in this review as a cooperating agency. A permit amendment requesting approval to mine at the LC East Project and within the KM Horizon at the Lost Creek Project was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	also
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	submitted to the WDEQ for review and approval. Approval will include an aquifer exemption.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Corporate Transactions and Financing Developments
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	RMB Australia Holdings L
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	imited
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We established a banking relationship with RMB Australia Holdings Limited (&#x201C;RMB&#x201D;) in 2013 which allowed for various financings during 2013. The first facility remained available for redraw as necessary for the Pathfinder acquisition, and $5.0 million was redrawn in December 2013 for that purpose. The facility was amended in March 2014 and an additional $1.5 million was drawn down at that time and, following the completion of the Technical Report (NI 43-101) on the Shirley Basin Project, an additional $3.5 million was drawn down as a revolver in September 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;In October 2015, the facility was amended to extend the maturity date of the $3.5 million revolver and spread the balance originally due March 2016 over four quarterly payments commencing March 2016 and concluding December 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;This loan facility is secured by the Pathfinder assets.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Off Take Sales Agreements
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As of December 31, 2015, we have ten off take sales agreements with various
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	U.S.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	utilities.
</FONT>

	These agreements were completed between 2012 and 2015 for deliveries between 2016 and 2021 as follows:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Shirley Basin Project
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We commissioned and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	an independent, NI 43-101 technical report on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Shirley Basin
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Technical Report on Resources Shirley Basin Uranium Project Carbon County, Wyoming
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; dated August 27, 2014 (the &#x201C;Shirley Basin Technical Report&#x201D;). This was the first technical report on mineral resources issued for Shirley Basin.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subsequently, on January 27, 2015, we commissioned and issued a second independent, NI 43-101 report on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	42
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage43"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#URG-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Shirley Basin: the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#x201C;Preliminary Economic Assessment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Shirley Basin Uranium Project Carbon County
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	, Wyoming,&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Shirley Basin
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	PEA&#x201D;).&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Shirley Basin PEA suggests the possible viability of the project, based upon analyses of metallurgy and recoverability, engineering, and economics including costs of capital expenditures and operating costs. The Shirley Basin Technical Report was based primarily on analyses of historic
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	drill hole data acquired with the purchase of the property. In addition, we drilled 14 confirmation holes prior to the preparation of the report.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The mineral resource
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Shirley Basin Project
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	were estimated in the Technical Report, and considered for economics and recoverability in the Shirley Basin PEA. The mineral resource estimate is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	set forth above, in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Item
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	s 1 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Business and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Properties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#x2013; Shirley Basin Project &#x2013; Shirley Basin.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Shirley Basin PEA contemplates
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that the Lost Creek processing facility
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	may
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	be utilized for the drying and packaging of uranium from Shirley Basin, for which we currently anticipate the need only for a satellite plant.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	However, the Shirley Basin permit application
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, filed in December 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	contemplates the construction of a full processing facility, providing greater construction and operating flexibility as may be dictated by market conditions.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	The Bootheel Project, LLC
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In April
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Management Committee of the Bootheel Project determined to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	continue the ownership and maintenance on the Bootheel property for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2016, which is the fiscal year end of The Bootheel Project, LLC.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	No additional exploration or development activities are planned at this time.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Management Changes
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In May 2015, Wayne Heili, then President and CEO, concluded his employment with the Company following the completion of the term of his employment agreement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Thereafter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, Jeffrey T. Klenda formally assumed the role of Acting Chief Executive Officer of Ur-Energy.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mr. Klenda has served as the Chairman of the Board of Directors and Executive Director of the Company since 2006. Mr. Heili also resigned from the Board of Directors in May 2015. At our Annual General and Special Meeting of Shareholders, held May 28, 2015, our shareholders elected all six of the nominated director candidates to our Board, including Gary Huber, PhD.&nbsp;&nbsp;Dr. Huber previously served as a director of the Company during 2007.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_RESULTS_OF_OPERATIONS>
<A NAME="FIS_RESULTS_OF_OPERATIONS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2015 Results of Operations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	U
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	O
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Production Costs
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	During
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	783,547
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	pounds of U
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	O
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	were captured within the Lost Creek plant.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	727,245
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of those pounds were packaged in drums and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	717,125
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	pounds
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of the drummed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	inventory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	were shipped to the conversion facility
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	where
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	925,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	pounds were sold to utility customers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, including 200,000 pounds of purchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;U
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	O
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ash cost per pound and non-cash cost per pound for produced uranium presented in the following Production Cost
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and U
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	O
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Sales and Cost of Sales tables are non-US GAAP measures.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	These measure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	do not have a standardized meaning or a consistent basis of calculation under US GAAP. These measures are used to assess business performance and may be used by certain investors to evaluate performance.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Please see the tables
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Notes:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:11PT;;">
	1.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Wellfield costs include all wellfield operating costs plus amortization of the related mineral property acquisition costs and depreciation of the related asset retirement obligation costs.&nbsp;&nbsp;Wellfield construction and development costs, which include wellfield drilling, header houses, pipelines, power lines, roads, fences and disposal wells, are treated as development expense and are not included in wellfield operating costs.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:11PT;;">
	2.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Non-cash costs include the depreciation of plant equipment and related asset retirement obligation costs, and the amortization of the investment in the mineral property acquisition costs. The expenses are calculated on a straight line basis so the expenses are typically constant for each quarter. The cost per pound from these costs will therefore typically vary based on production levels only.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:11PT;;">
	3.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Plant costs include all plant operating costs, site overhead costs and depreciation of the related plant construction and asset retirement obligation costs.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:11PT;;">
	4.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Distribution costs include all shipping costs and costs charged by the conversion facility for weighing, sampling, assaying and storing the U
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	3
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	O
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	8
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	prior to sale.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Production costs have remained fairly consistent o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ver the past four quarters while the production costs per pound generally decreased during the year.&nbsp;&nbsp;In total, wellfield, plant and distribution cash costs were very consistent quarter on quarter during 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;The respective cash costs per pound decreased overall during the year and the decreases were primarily driven by increasing levels of production.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	44
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage45"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#URG-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Ad valorem and severance taxes fluctuate based on pounds extracted and the relative sales value of those pounds.&nbsp;&nbsp;Additionally, the State of Wyoming retroactively increased the ad valorem and severance tax industry factor by 31% in 2014 Q4 and later revised the increase down to six percent in 2015 Q1, which led to a substantially lower cost and cost per pound during that quarter. Fluctuations in the ad valorem and severance taxes per pound in subsequent quarters w
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ere
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	primarily due to fluctuations in the average price per pound sold during those same quarters.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Wellfield cash costs in 2015 Q1 were somewhat elevated due to one-off computer and communications related expenses and the annual labor bonus. They then decreased significantly in 2015 Q2 due to not repeating the one-off costs from 2015 Q1 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	having
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	open
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	positions in the labor force but then returned to normal levels in the past two quarters primarily due to the replacement of those vacant positions and higher labor benefit costs.&nbsp;&nbsp;Despite the higher costs in 2015 Q4, the cash cost per pound captured decreased to $4.80 as a result of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	higher production level achieved during the quarter and averaged $5.00 per pound for the year. Wellfield non-cash costs are normally relatively fixed.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, most of the capitalized reclamation costs for the first mine unit were expensed through depreciation as of 2015 Q3 based on our original estimated time to commence reclamation. Actual reclamation has not commenced because we are still extracting pounds from all header houses in the first mine unit.&nbsp;&nbsp;Reclamation will not begin until after we have completed the extraction process.&nbsp;&nbsp;Therefore, the non-cash costs included in wellfield costs declined substantially in the last two quarters of 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;Because of the lower wellfield non-cash costs and the increasing level of pounds captured, the resulting non-cash cost per pound captured decreased to $2.92 in 2015 Q4 and averaged $5.58 for the year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Plant cash costs were relatively stable during the year with the higher costs in 2015 Q2 being driven by a one-off road construction payment to Sweetwater county and the lower costs in 2015 Q4 being the result of lower than average federal agency costs. Because of the lower cash costs in 2015 Q4 and the higher level of production, the resulting cash cost per pound drummed decreased to $8.90 and averaged $9.92 for the year.&nbsp;&nbsp;Plant non-cash costs did not change during the year.&nbsp;&nbsp;Minimal fluctuations in the non-cash cost per pound drummed were solely due to changes in pounds drummed and the average non-cash cost per pound drummed for the year was $2.74.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Distribution costs increased in the final quarter of the year due to having received a number of final assays along with their associated costs during the period.&nbsp;&nbsp;Pounds shipped remained consistent with previous quarters and the resulting cash cost per pound shipped in 2015 Q4 increased to $0.70 as a result of the higher cost, which was consistent with $0.69 per pound average for the year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In 2015 Q2, we purchased 200,000 pounds at the then spot price of $39.39 per pound. The pounds were delivered into one of our scheduled contract deliveries.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	45
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

	Unit

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;

</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="2" VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:10.50%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2015 Q4
</FONT>
